headers.value: default-src 'self' *.vercel.app; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' *.vercel.com *.vercel.app; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' *.vercel.com *.vercel.app *.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' *.vercel.com *.vercel.app *.gstatic.com data:; font-src 'self' *.vercel.com *.vercel.app *.gstatic.com data:;
